name: The Shadow
description: '''Yoav Eliasi''' ({{langx|he|יואב אליאסי}}; born November 22, 1977), commonly known by his [[stage name]] '''The Shadow''' ({{langx|he|הצל|link=nono}}, ''Ha-Tzel''), is an Israeli [[rapper]], [[blogger]], and far-right [[Political Activist|political activist]]. He was part of the roster of artists on the label TACT Records.
